description:
Cushion the shock of the miles and get the blister-reducing benefits of toe socks in ultra-thin fabric. They let your toes splay naturally while minimizing friction and moisture build-up.

  • Super thin CoolMax® XtraLife blend wicks moisture and helps prevent blisters
  • Arch support for secure and stable fit
  • Terry cushion underfoot reduces impact forces
  • Anatomical right and left foot design enhances fit
name: Injinji Ultra Run No Show Cool Max Socks - Unisex
